name: Packedtory
description:
Game Boy emulator is required (BGB emulator is recommended)
Entirely made in Game Boy assembly (also known as gbZ80)

Create belts to connect entry points to exit points and keep boxes moving!

Controls:

  • S (A): Create belt in selected position  
  • A (B): Delete belt in selected position
  • Enter (Start): Pause the game
  • Right Shift (Select): Select a different belt type
  • Arrows (pad): move map selector
